document.full_text: an appeal by the nfl to reimpose a lockout on players while they remain in dispute was rejected by a federal court judge on wednesday, opening the door for a return to work.
document.title: judge rejects league's request for lockout return
lines_and_colors: an appeal by the nfl to reimpose a lockout on players while they remain in dispute was rejected by a federal court judge on wednesday, opening the door for a return to work.
